messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Poet David Whyte  WAS Re: Cult uniform
messages.msgSnippet: This is totally resonating with a set of tapes I borrowed from my boss - by poet David Whyte - perfect people are all around us.  Even those we fiercely
messages.messageBody:
This is totally resonating with a set of tapes I borrowed from my boss - by poet David Whyte - perfect people are all around us. Even those we fiercely oppose. They are merely expressing humanity. Fits unschooling, IMHO. We let children express their humanity 24/7.

Any fans of his out there?

My thots

Tim T

----- Original Message -----
From: RJHill241@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 10, 2003 11:47 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Cult uniform




> I am not perfect but I like me the way I am.>>


I'm not sure who posted this as I am still 491 emails behind, but I just
wanted to say that you ARE perfect, and each day you are probably trying to
perfect a little more. But all in all there couldn't be a more perfect you.

That's goes for everyone.

Rhonda - having some seriously Zen-like moments
